tool_description: Analyzes the impact of subscription plan changes on existing customers including pricing effects, feature changes, and churn risk assessment.

plan_id.description: Identifier of the plan being modified

customer_segment.description: Target customer segment: small_business, enterprise, individual

grandfathering_enabled.description: Whether existing customers keep current pricing

notice_period_days.description: Days of advance notice before changes take effect

market_competition_level.description: Market competition level: low, medium, high

error_messages: Invalid plan_id: Plan identifier must be a non-empty string.
Invalid price values: current_price and new_price must be non-negative numbers.
Empty feature arrays: Both current_features and new_features must contain at least one item.
Invalid customer_segment: Must be one of [small_business, enterprise, individual].
Invalid notice_period_days: Must be a non-negative integer.
Invalid market_competition_level: Must be one of [low, medium, high].
Invalid seasonal_factor: Must be between 0.5 and 2.0.
usage: Provide plan_id, price values, and feature arrays. Optionally specify customer_segment, grandfathering settings, notice_period_days, market_competition_level, and seasonal_factor for detailed impact analysis.

features_added.description: Features being added to the plan

features_removed.description: Features being removed from the plan

estimated_churn_rate.description: Predicted customer churn rate due to changes

customer_satisfaction_impact.description: Expected impact on customer satisfaction: positive, neutral, negative

affected_customer_count.description: Estimated number of customers affected by changes
